What are the treatments for Febrile Ulceronecrotic Mucha-Habermann disease ?,"How is febrile ulceronecrotic Mucha-Habermann disease (FUMHD) treated? It is important that FUMHD is diagnosed and treated as soon as possible. While a number of treatments have been tried, it is hard to asses the benefit of the therapie
